title: The Moon Landing Was Faked
description: Some believe the 1969 Apollo moon landing was filmed on a Hollywood set, directed by Stanley Kubrick.
notable_quotes: One small step for man, one giant leap for mankind... or for Hollywood?
The flag moves, but there's no wind on the moon! Coincidence?

title: Area 51 Holds Alien Technology
description: Conspiracy theorists claim Area 51 is a top-secret government facility housing alien technology.
notable_quotes: I’ve seen things you wouldn’t believe… saucers on fire off the shoulder of Nevada.
Just because they say it's a weather balloon doesn’t mean it is.

title: The Earth is Flat
description: Advocates believe that the Earth is flat and that satellite imagery is part of a vast conspiracy.
notable_quotes: If the Earth is round, why don’t we feel it spinning?
Water doesn’t curve… think about it.

title: The Reptilian Elite
description: Some believe a race of reptilian aliens controls world leaders, influencing global politics in secret.
notable_quotes: Ever noticed their eyes blink sideways?
They’re hiding in plain sight, wearing human masks!

title: The Illuminati Controls the World
description: A secret society allegedly pulls the strings of global politics and entertainment, shaping the world to its liking.
notable_quotes: Why is there an all-seeing eye on the dollar bill?
The Illuminati is everywhere—just follow the triangles!

title: Bigfoot Exists
description: Bigfoot, a giant ape-like creature, is said to roam the forests of North America, evading human detection.
notable_quotes: If it’s a hoax, why hasn’t anyone disproved it?
That’s not a bear—look at those footprints!

title: 5G Causes Mind Control
description: Conspiracists believe that 5G cell towers emit frequencies capable of controlling thoughts or even causing health issues.
notable_quotes: Why do we need so many towers if 5G is so fast?
Your WiFi router might be the real enemy.

title: Time Travelers Built the Pyramids
description: Some claim the Egyptian pyramids were constructed with advanced technology brought back by time travelers from the future.
notable_quotes: The precision is beyond what ancient tools could achieve!
Maybe they didn’t just leave, but they’ll be back.

title: Dinosaurs Helped Build Stonehenge
description: A fringe theory suggests that dinosaurs, trained by ancient humans, were used to transport the massive stones.
notable_quotes: How else could they move 25-ton rocks?
T-Rex may have had tiny arms, but it had strong friends.

title: The Bermuda Triangle is an Alien Portal
description: Some believe that the Bermuda Triangle is a portal used by extraterrestrials to abduct humans or transport technology.
notable_quotes: It’s not just bad weather—ships disappear without a trace!
Aliens might have found the ultimate teleportation hotspot.
